name: Recipe: Black-Back Perch Stew
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Black-Back Perch Stew.

value.name: Fish
value.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

value.name: Jueyun Chili
value.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

value.name: Salt
value.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

value.name: Violetgrass
value.desc: A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

value.name: Black-Back Perch Stew
value.desc: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.

value.name: Xiangling
value.desc: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

value.name: Wanmin Restaurant's Boiled Fish
value.desc: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant</color>
